name: 7PCS Magnetic Torx Screwdriver Set T8 to T30 Star Screwdrivers (7PCS TORX SCREWDRIVER)
short_description: Torx/star screwdriver set is Chrome vanadium steel with heat treatment, high hardness and good toughness and resistance,large torque, long service life.
Black finish blade with magnetic tips which could conveniently attracts screws.
Cushion grip handle for comfort and control,With ergonomic TPR handle and button on it, it helps you to use easily.
Set Includes: T8*60MM,T10*60MM,T15*100MM,T20*100MM,T25*100MM,T27*100MM,T30*100MM.
Torx/star screwdrivers are widely used for maintenance and assembly of all kinds of mechanical equipment ,domestic appliances and furniture.
product_description: GURADESIGN 7PCS Magnetic Torx Screwdriver Set T8 to T30 Star Screwdrivers (7PCS TORX SCREWDRIVER)

name: Klein Tools 32510 Magnetic Multibit Screwdriver with Sturdy Torx, Hex, Spanner, Tri-Wing, Torq and Nut Tamperproof Bits and Storage Block
short_description: Multi-bit screwdriver / nut driver with sturdy bit and screw holding magnet that allows for screws to fit securely in place for easy use
Includes complete tamperproof bit set in storage block
TORX bits included: T7, T8, T10, T15, T20, T25, T27, T30 and T40. TORX is a registered trademark of Acument Intellectual Properties, LLC
Includes 3/32-Inch, 7/64-Inch, 1/8-Inch, 9/64-Inch, 5/32-Inch and 3/16-Inch Fraction Hex bits
Includes 2, 2.5, 3, 4 and 5 mm metric hex bits
Includes 4, 6, 8, and 10 Spanner bits
Includes 1, 2, 3 and 4 Tri-Wing bits
product_description: The Klein Tools Magnetic Screwdriver Set with 32 pieces provides tamperproof reliability and the flexibility to tackle a variety of jobs. A Cushion-Grip handle offers greater torque and comfort while the industrial strength steel bits lend long-lasting durability. For added convenience, a gray PVC storage block is included for trouble-free bit storage. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

name: JOREST 52-IN-1 Precision Screwdriver Set, Mini Repair Tool Kit with Torx for Macbook, Computer, Laptop, iPhone, PS5, Xbox, Switch, Glasses, Watch, Ring Doorbell, Electronic, Small Gift Gadget for Men
short_description: 【Double-end screwdriver bits】 The screwdriver set contains 24 double-end screwdriver bits and 48 models. Complete specifications ensure you have the smallest yet most complete electronic tool suite. Screwdriver bits are made of high-quality CRV steel, which is wear-resistant and has high hardness.

【Lightweight and easy to carry】 The screwdriver set only weighs 175g and fits in your pocket. The storage box adopts a sliding cover design, and the storage slot has built-in magnets to quickly fix the bit to avoid loss.

【Locking design and magnetic adsorption】 The handle head is equipped with a ball bearing lock, which can firmly fix the bit. The handle has a built-in strong magnet that can easily absorb small screws. It is also equipped with a magnet. When using a large batch of bits, the magnet can be placed on the side of the bit to enhance the magnetism.

【Wide range of applications】Suitable for iPhone7/8/X/XR/11/12/13, Samsung/Huawei/Xiaomi and other mobile phones; iPad/Mini/Air/Pro and Huawei/Honor and other tablets; Macbook/Air/Pro ;Kindle/Kindle Fire; Ring Video Doorbell/Video Doorbell 2/Pro/Elite; Model aircraft, drones, glasses, watches, etc.

【52-in-1 precision screwdriver set】 including Philips PH0000(+1.0) PH000 (+1.5) PH00 (+2.0) PH0 PH1, etc.; Flathead SL1.0 SL1.5 SL2.5 SL3.5; Torx T1 T2 T3 T4 T5; Torx Security TR6 TR7 TR8 TR9 TR10, etc.; Tri-point Y000 (Y0.6) Y00 (Y1.5) Y0 (Y2.5), etc.; Pentalobe P2(0.8) P5(1.2); Hex H0.7 H0.9 H1. 0 H1.3 H1.5 H2.0 etc.; Triangle 2.0 2.3 3.0 3.7; U2.3 U2.6; MID 2.5; SIM. It also comes with two double-ended pry bars to facilitate repairs; and a model sticker to help you quickly identify the bit.

name: NEIKO 10048A Security Bit Set 100-Piece Set Cr-V Steel 1/4-inch Adapters Phillips Slotted Hex Torx Star Tamperproof Pozi Square Spanner Torque Tri-Wing Clutch Spline Wing Nut, Security Torx Bit Set
short_description: DURABILITY: These bits are made of a high-quality chrome vanadium steel for strong hardness that can withstand more torque, reduce wear-outs, ensure longevity, and durability!

PRECISION BITS: Each hex bit set is precisely and automatically machined built to ensure accurate size, chamfered bit ends insert smoothly into fasteners and protect both bits and fasteners from damaged edges and ensure a smooth rotation.

DRILL AND SCREWDRIVER BIT SET: Each security hex torx bit set has a sandblasted finish for optimum strength to use with your drill or impact driver. This square bit set includes Nut Drivers, Security Bits, Torx, Slotted, Phillips, Square, Pozi, Hex, Socket, and other specialty bits.

ORGANIZED STORAGE: Our small screwdriver bit set includes a sturdy plastic organizing case for secure storage and easy carrying for working on appliances, computers, electronics, home DIY projects and much more.

100 PIECE SET INCLUDES: A blow mold plastic organizing case for secure storage and easy carrying, and many of the most common tamper-proof type security bit sizes, including tri-wing bits, torx star bits, spanner bits, and hex bits.
product_description: NEIKO 10048A Security Bit Set contains many of the most common tamperproof security bit sizes, including tri-wing bits, torx bits, spanner bits, and hex bits. Security bits set contains: (1) magnetic bit holder, (1) socket bit holder, (1) 1/4-inch square drive x 1/4-inch hex x 1-inch extension, (1) ¼-inch square drive x 1/4-inch hex x 2-Inch extension, (8) Phillips bits (#0, 1, 2, 3 and 4) (9) Slotted bits (3, 4, 4.5, 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7 and 8mm) (9) Metric Hex bits (1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 5.5, 6 and 8mm) (6) Metric Hex Tamperproof bits (2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5 and 6mm) (10) SAE Hex bits (1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 7/64, 1/8, 9/64, 5/32, 3/16, 7/32 and ¼-inch) (6) SAE Hex Tamperproof bits (5/64, 3/32, 7/64, 1/8, 9/64 and 5/32-inch) (9) Torx Star bits (T8, 10, 15, 20, 25, 27, 30, 35 and 40) (9) Torx Star Tamperproof bits (T8, 10, 15, 20, 25, 27, 30, 35 and 40) (8) Pozi drive bits (#0, 1, 2, and 3) (4) Square Recess bits (#0, 1, 2 and 3) (4) Spanner bits (#4, 6, 8 and 10) (3) Torque bits (#6, 8 and 10) (4) Tri-Wing bits (#1, 2, 3 and 4) (3) Clutch bits (#1, 2 and 3) (3) Spline bits (M5, 6 and 8) (1) Wing Nut driver Set also includes plastic storage carry case.

name: 26-Piece Magnetic Screwdriver & Bit Set - Strong Magnetic Bit Holder and Screwdriver Bits, Durable & Versatile, Ergonomic Cushion Grip 95mm & 210mm Handles, Torx, Square, Phillips, Slotted Bits
short_description: 【MAGNETIC PERFORMANCE】 Powerful magnetic bit adapter and magnetic screwdriver head holder firmly secure bits and screws, making tasks easier and more efficient.
【DURABLE MATERIALS】 Constructed from Cr-V steel with heat treatment for high hardness, good toughness, and resistance; magnetic tips feature a black oxide finish for added strength.
【VERSATILE USE】 26-piece set includes 12 torx bits, 3 square bits, 4 phillips bits, 5 slotted bits, 1 short screwdriver handle, and 1 long screwdriver handle, suitable for various applications.
【FLEXIBLE LENGTHS】 Set includes 95mm and 210mm screwdriver handles, allowing for easy access to hard-to-reach or complex areas for various tasks.
【ERGONOMIC DESIGN】 Cushion grip handle with ergonomic TPR material and convenient button ensures comfort and control during use, reducing hand fatigue.

short_description: HEAVY-DUTY S2 STEEL - Premium S2 steel with sturdy, hardened, and tempered construction, providing a lifespan 10 times longer than standard bits.
ADVANCED DESIGN - CNC machined, hardened core for enhanced strength and durability, with a Manganese Phosphate coating to prevent rust.
TAMPER - PROOF DESIGN - Includes tamper-resistant Torx bits for added security, ideal for specialized fasteners and versatile applications.
MAGNETIC IMPACT TIPS - Strengthened magnetic Torx bits ensure easy pickup and precise screw placement. Magnetism remains strong after repeated use.

WIDE APPLICATION - 36-piece tamper-proof bit set (T5-T40), durable for automotive tasks, home repairs, and woodworking projects. Compatible with drills and drivers.

name: 27PCS Impact Torx Bit Set (TT7-TT40), S2 Steel Security with Tamper Proof & Magnetic Screwdriver Bits, 1"&2" Long CNC Machined Torx Set with Compact Storage Case
short_description: 【UNBREAKABLE DURABILITY FOR PROFESSIONALS】Crafted with S2 Alloy Steel and precision-hardened cores, the RIYNIBIY Torx Bit Set withstands 3X higher torque than standard bits. Our security torx bit set features a manganese phosphate coating to prevent rust even in humid workshops, ensuring 10X longer lifespan for automotive and industrial repairs.

【TAMPER-PROOF DESIGN FOR ULTIMATE SECURITY】Engineered with tamper-proof torx bit set (TT7-TT40) compatibility, these bits lock into anti-theft screws used in cars, electronics, and machinery. The center-pin design blocks unauthorized access—perfect for securing Tesla dashboards or iPhone logic boards.

【MAGNETIC PRECISION IN TIGHT SPACES】Equipped with magnetic screwdriver bits that retain 98% magnetism after 5,000+ uses, our torx set grips screws effortlessly. The 3" magnetic extension reaches deep into engine bays or laptop housings without dropping fasteners.

【TRUSTED BY MECHANICS & TECH EXPERTS】From removing tamper-proof screws on Ford F-150 dashboards to repairing PS5 cooling fans, this torx bit set covers 27 critical sizes (TT7-TT40) for DIYers and pros. Includes 2" and 1" bits for compact drills and impact drivers.

【LIFETIME SUPPORT & SATISFACTION GUARANTEE】RIYNIBIY backs every security torx bit set with 24/7 USA-based tech support and a no-questions-asked replacement policy. Join 50,000+ mechanics who upgraded to industrial-grade durability.

name: 49-in-1 Small Screwdriver Set, [Super Durable] Tiny Torx Screwdriver Fits All Ring Doorbell, Precision Magnetic Mini Repair Tool Kit for Watch, Laptop, Eyeglass, Camera, Men Gift Screw Driver
short_description: [49in1, Household Must-Have] This small screwdriver head adopts double-sided design, making it more compact and comprehensive, it comes with 49 different bits (Phillips, Flat, Torx, Torx Security, Pentalobe, Hexagon, etc.). Whether you're a professional fixer or a home repair hobby, this mini screwdriver set has what you need to disassemble, repair, and reassemble phones, game consoles, wearables, laptops, desktops, tablets and much more!

[Fits Ring Doorbell] The T6 and T15 torx head used for Ring Video Doorbell, Ring Doorbell 2, Ring Doorbell Pro and Elite Battery Change, Charge & Replacement As Well As Wifi Password Reset Access, Security Removal Without Breaking.

[Bearing Steel Bits, Super Durable] All precision bits are made of the best Bearing Steel (Steel for tanks) and the hardness can reach over HRC65°, resist abrasion, oxidation and corrosion, ensure long time use. In addition, the strong magnetize-able tip easily pick-up and hold screws, helping you handle all tiny screws.
[Ergonomic Design] Super smooth swivel cap for easy screw removal. Unique diamond shape full metal handle makes sure you can turn any screw.
[Small and Sturdy Case] Small and Sturdy case with stay shut latch ensures safe storage and transportation. The bit tip pattern on the box makes it easy to find every time you use it.

[Wesdut Mini Screwdriver Set] Covered by Wesdut's Lifetime Warranty. Need a gift? it makes an excellent choice for Christmas stocking fillers, Thanksgiving gifts, Father's Day gifts and Valentine's Day gifts.
